website_summaries.verdict: Built for speed as well as beginners.
pros: Known for immediate comfort, decreasing the time it takes to achieve results while waiting for a shoe to fit right
We love that beginners can perform in this shoe as well as those winning 100 and 200 meter races
cons: Great for running, but not for all track and field events

customer_reviews.title: Great for price!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking shoe and feels great when it's on. I'm a collegiate track sprinter and I was hoping this would be a good practice shoe. It is very comfortable at first but it doesn't stay tight around my foot, even when I tighten the laces and that's true for even the straights, around curves I feel like I'm going to slip out of the shoe. All this to say ive even had Nike and other top brand shoes do this, and it may be a personal thing to me, but for the price, you can't go wrong with this shoe!
customer_reviews.author: J Marlow

customer_reviews.title: Can't Beat The Value
customer_reviews.text: A good trainer spike for an elite sprinter. The spike plate is 3/4 sole, so for racing 100/200m, advanced sprinters will likely prefer a full nylon sole with little flex. Stated, these are very comfortable, and the value couldn't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sheldon

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable
customer_reviews.text: Very bright. Helps to spot my child amongst all the other runners. Seem a little thin and would have liked a little support, but altogether good. Wish it would have come with extra spikes as he lost one on the first day.
customer_reviews.author: CPhelps

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are advertised with spikes but when they were ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are advertised with spikes but when they were delivered there was NO spikes . Is that normally the case? Fabian.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Spikes not included
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that spikes were not included yet the key for the spikes was enclosed. This is like purchasing shoes and only the laces are enclosed. They are snug so half a size up is recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Hilljone

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit & Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my grandson. It is his first experience running track. He says he loves the way these fit and says they are very comfortable. Looks like I made a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Chick105

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: I only used these for three track meets so I can't evaluate the durability but they held up great the few times I used them. They looked great and fit great for me with very wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Erik The Swede

customer_reviews.title: Get a half size larger
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why puma is doing this, but all of their shoes seem to be a half size small, and they apparently don't produce 12.5
customer_reviews.author: U. Dasilva

customer_reviews.title: Colorful track shoes
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this shoe for my son to wear to his track meets - mid way through the season, the coach recommends a sprint shoe and no sporting goods store in our area had his size! He wore these to his last 4 meets and said they were great, loves the fit, grip is great.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Jazzy, light but sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: High school freshman high jumps and runs the 200. Shoes are excellent, light weight, good traction, spikes and tool included.
customer_reviews.author: James Fussell

customer_reviews.title: my quarter miler son love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Usain Bolt shoes, my quarter miler son love these shoes...
customer_reviews.author: Robert Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Designed for sprinter only
customer_reviews.text: Great sprinting shoes. Very well made. My son won first place in the 200 and second in the 100 this weekend. It's all in the shoes
customer_reviews.author: Andre Cazeau

customer_reviews.title: Great track shoe...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for my son who runs track in high school. He loves them and his time has even gotten better...Would buy again from this seller Exceeded our expectations...
customer_reviews.author: Devona Postlethwait

customer_reviews.title: Fit As Expected
customer_reviews.text: My son uses these for track ; he said they are comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Ivori Murray

customer_reviews.title: ... size as was suggested by others and it works great.
customer_reviews.text: We did order this slightly larger size as was suggested by others and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Fit just right. Are light weight and comfortable. Easy to put spikes in and take out. Love the look of shoes as well.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: which was good, but they were a little longer than I
customer_reviews.text: They were wider than most cleats, which was good, but they were a little longer than I expected
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: He loves them and says they are perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my son for track. He loves them and says they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: i didnt like how they gave me the key to put the ...
customer_reviews.text: i didnt like how they gave me the key to put the spikes in the shoe but didnt give me the spikes at all
customer_reviews.author: Jovontay

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son said he run a lot faster with them
customer_reviews.author: Kerie

customer_reviews.title: My son is happy with the shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son is happy with the shoes. They did not come with the spike tool and he lost four spikes the first time he tried them out. One of the spike holes was subsequently ruined, presumably from the spike coming out.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Five

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good color... really should ordered a size larger seen there was no half size
customer_reviews.author: MPDaley

customer_reviews.title: Give them a try
customer_reviews.text: It felt weird when I first put them on but once I ran in them they felt great.
customer_reviews.author: dominic mikula

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal on Quality
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe the quality for the low cost. And my son says he runs like the wind is his father!!!💨💨💨💨💨💨🏃‍♂️🏃‍♂️🏃‍♂️🏃‍♂️🏃‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome spikes for my son that is a sprinter! He loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda J Webber

customer_reviews.title: Anticipated better
customer_reviews.text: Fitted perfectly, well designed for a wide foot. Otherwise just OK, felt good over 100/200m, but throughout 400m were squeaky and felt like the spike plate was lose. Lots of comments over the cosmetics, but lets face it, they are supposed to perform not look pretty, and frankly, next time, I will go back to the Saucony Showdowns.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: with spike plate only in the front of the shoe ...
customer_reviews.text: with spike plate only in the front of the shoe I wouldn't suggest this for those who do hurdles !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, fast shipping..
customer_reviews.text: Great track spikes, fit as expected. Received them extremely fast(2 days). Would buy from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: Omega8

customer_reviews.title: Great sprint shoes.
customer_reviews.text: My son runs 4×100, hurdles, high jump, 400m. These shoes work excellent. Very light but supportive. They came with spikes and wrench to customize to your liking.
customer_reviews.author: sports dad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my son, he absolutely loves them!!
customer_reviews.author: MHarris

customer_reviews.title: its a great spikes, it feels like the Bolt Evospeed spikes ...
customer_reviews.text: its a great spikes , it feels like the Bolt Evospeed spikes and one thing i mostly love about this spikes is that it gives you and competitive feeling , like you would sprint some great time in it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good material. Fit well
customer_reviews.text: Bought 1 size up. Good material. Fit well. Just like the picture
customer_reviews.author: Earlene

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Spikes don't stay in shoes!!! Did you send right size spikes???
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Chomos

customer_reviews.title: He does long jump and triple jump and thinks these will be great for that purpose
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 15 y.o. son for track. He does long jump and triple jump and thinks these will be great for that purpose. Very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: EasternOregonMom

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's TFX Sprint V4 Track And Field Shoe
product_meta.description:
This track shoe from PUMA utilizes lightweight comfort features and a spike configuration inspired by world-famous athlete Usian Bolt.

PUMA is the global athletic brand that successfully fuses influences from sport, lifestyle and fashion. PUMA's unique industry perspective delivers the unexpected in sport-lifestyle footwear, apparel and accessories, through technical innovation and revolutionary design.
feature_bullets: Track and field shoe featuring one-piece microfiber upper, PUMA cat logo, and eight-pin Peebax spike plate with cutouts
Die-cut EVA sockliner cemented with Strobel board for snug fit
